meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a colony of animals.
meanings.sent1: The polyzoic creatures worked together to build their nest.
meanings.sent2: Ants are known for their polyzoic behavior, living and working in large colonies.
meanings.sent3: The polyzoic ants held a town meeting to discuss their next construction project.
meanings.sent4: The polyzoic society of bees hummed with activity, each member playing a vital role.
meanings.sent5: In the forest, the polyzoic insects created a bustling community, each contributing to the whole.

meanings.sent1: The polyzoic birds nested together in the tall trees.
meanings.sent2: Some fish species exhibit polyzoic behavior, swimming in schools for protection.
meanings.sent3: The polyzoic penguins waddled in unison, creating a comical sight.
meanings.sent4: The polyzoic wolves moved as one, hunting in coordinated packs.
meanings.sent5: The polyzoic bacteria thrived in the warm, nutrient-rich environment of the pond.
